main event: A witness observed a formation of 18-20 fast-moving, silent objects with flashing green and red lights over Hinton, Oklahoma on January 30, 1965.
interesting points: The objects were estimated to be moving at around 1,000 miles per hour.
The objects crossed the sky in a straight line from west to east.
The witness and their friend observed the objects, but when they called a third friend to come look, the objects had already disappeared.
The witness compared the size of the objects to being slightly smaller than a car.
The witness reported seeing the objects at around 40 degrees above the horizon.
sighted object: formation of 18-20 fast-moving, silent objects with flashing green and red lights
